column4: i did a sudo apt-get install eggdrop it installed but scattered it accross my hardrive, i have eggdrop folders in /usr/lib/eggdrop /usr/share/eggdrop /usr/share/doc/eggdrop and finally /usr/share/doc/eggdrop-data and with all this i cant figure out how the heck to configure the thing nor are the /usr/share dirs writeable so eggdrop would have to be run from sudo? i dunno about all this and neither does the people in #egghelp they reco
oh sorry I misread your question :p
config files are probably in /etc somewhere
